name: patient-care-aggregator-reporting
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.lint: node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli validate -i specification/patient-care-aggregator-api-consumer-api.yaml && node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli validate -i specification/patient-care-aggregator-api-producer-api-standards.yaml && node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli validate -i specification/patient-care-aggregator-api-record-service-api.yaml
scripts.publish: ./node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli generate -i specification/patient-care-aggregator-api-consumer-api.yaml --generator-key v3.0  -g openapi -o build && rm openapitools.json && mv build/openapi.json build/patient-care-aggregator-api-consumer-api.json && ./node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli generate -i specification/patient-care-aggregator-api-producer-api-standards.yaml --generator-key v3.0  -g openapi -o build && rm openapitools.json && mv build/openapi.json build/patient-care-aggregator-api-producer-api-standards.json && ./node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli generate -i specification/patient-care-aggregator-api-record-service-api.yaml --generator-key v3.0  -g openapi -o build && rm openapitools.json && mv build/openapi.json build/patient-care-aggregator-api-record-service-api.json

author: NHS Digital
